title: Paper-based chemometer device for the estimation of α-amylase—a biomarker for pancreatitis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24365-24372
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03804E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bethuel Daurai, Manashjit Gogoi
We show the working of a paper-based chemometer device (PCD). Starch triiodide coated on the channel discolours upon the addition of α-amylase. The discoloured distance is directly proportional to the concentration of α-amylase.
